plugins.name: Variables JSON Import
plugins.description:
Batch-import design tokens from JSON.


Thanks to Travis Spomer for the original version. <3


This Figma plugin converts Design Token Community Group (DTCG)-formatted JSON into Figma Variables.


Limitations

•Works in the Figma desktop app and Chrome.

Safari isn’t supported because browser file-access restrictions block the import.

•Not a full DTCG parser—some valid files may fail to load.


Supported token types

•string

•number / dimension / duration

•boolean

•Aliases to any supported token in the same JSON or Figma file

•Aliases to tokens in other JSON / Figma files (if those variables are published to a team library)


Open-source → https://github.com/thierryc/figma-variables-JSON-import

accepted.name: Thierry
accepted.description: I am Thierry – a designer, developer, and, typographer based New York. I’ve worked with companies large and small, building and maintaining design systems.

plugins.tagline: Import variables from a single JSON file, or multiple modes from multiple JSON files.

plugins.name: Logify
plugins.description:
Keep your design system consistent — and versioned.


This plugin helps you track changes to local styles and components in your Figma file. Whether you’re updating colors, tweaking typography, or refactoring components, it captures the differences between versions and presents them in a clean, structured changelog — directly on the canvas.


No need to manually note what was changed or when. Just run the plugin, and it will detect added, modified, or removed design tokens and UI elements. You can then insert a formatted changelog as a Figma frame, perfect for documentation, handoff, or version control.


🔹 Compare current and previous states automatically

🔹 Generate a visual changelog block inside your file

🔹 Group changes by Added / Changed / Removed

🔹 Keep your system transparent and maintainable


Simple. Reliable. Fully local. No external syncs required.

accepted.name: Pavel
accepted.description: Product designer with 5+ years of experience in web and mobile UI.

plugins.tagline: Effortless changelog for your design system

Simple. Reliable. Fully local. No external syncs required.
134288.release_notes:
- Implemented chunked data storage for better performance on large files
- Updated element collection & comparison logic for improved accuracy
- Added progress indicators to UI for clearer feedback during operations
134288.tagline: Effortless changelog for your design system

plugins.name: Color Snap
plugins.description:
Color Snap instantly extracts a 5-color palette (plus a smooth 45° gradient) from any selected image, no extra clicks or external tools required. Simply select an image in your Figma file, run Color Snap, and watch it generate:

  1. Five 48×48 solid swatches of your image’s dominant colors
  2. One 48×48 gradient swatch blending those colors at a 45° angle
  3. Neatly arranged in a “Snapped colors” frame, ready for reuse


Why you’ll love it

  1. Speed up mood-boarding: Pull palettes directly from visuals
  2. Stay on-brand: Quickly generate gradients that perfectly match your assets


Vibe coded with ❤❤️️ using o4-mini high
plugins.tagline: Instantly extract color palette from any selected image

plugins.name: Token Swapper
plugins.description:
To use it, simply activate the plugin, import any component from any library, and it does the rest! 🚀


https://www.loom.com/share/6d526c11f63644318e9c604193e11e3d


Effortless Token Swapping Across Files

Swap Design Tokens between your design system and working files in seconds. Maintain consistency without duplicating libraries or styles.


Full-page Token Replacement

Need to update a full design with new tokens? One click with "Swap All" updates every node, text style, and color variable instantly — no manual work required.


Intelligent Scan & Replace

Automatically scan files for elements not linked to tokens — including colors and fonts — and batch replace them with variables from your design system. Eliminate inconsistencies with a few clicks.


Cross-theme & Project Flexibility

Manage multiple projects with a single design system source. Token Swapper ensures all visual assets remain connected to their proper tokens, even across brands or themes.


Non-destructive Workflow

Token Swapper doesn’t overwrite or break your original styles. Switch between token sets and preview changes without permanent commitment — perfect for testing themes or migrating designs.


Smart Query Processing

Let the plugin process bulk token changes in the background. Your edits persist even when closing the plugin, making large updates smoother and safer.


Beta Features: More Power, More Control

Our beta tools let you go even deeper — manage font tokens, swap icons, and process entire pages. Just stay in the same token session for best results while we keep improving.


FAQs

Does this work with free Figma plans?

Yes! Token Swapper is fully compatible with all Figma plans — free included. No need for professional tiers to keep your tokens in sync.


What if I use my own token naming system?

That’s okay! As long as your token names and structure match across files, Token Swapper will recognize and replace them intelligently.


Why use Token Swapper instead of doing it manually?

Manual token swaps are time-consuming, error-prone, and hard to scale. Token Swapper automates the entire process, saving you hours of work and ensuring consistency.


Tutorials

https://www.loom.com/share/3d743648bd3643e5a50b7dff7d54bbf2

https://www.loom.com/share/b3a6f11e12734fe18da5d30106fe4c54

https://www.loom.com/share/0ec7731eb20f404d9259222377f40cef
plugins.tagline: Swaps font, color and space tokens of components imported from other libraries.

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Checker|🔎 تحليل التباين وفقًا لـ WCAG
plugins.description:
في تجربة المستخدم، وضوح النصوص على الخلفيات يلعب دورًا أساسيًا في ضمان قراءة مريحة وسهلة للجميع، بما في ذلك الأشخاص ذوي الإعاقة البصرية. وهنا يأتي دور معايير WCAG التي تحدد نسبة التباين المثلى بين النص والخلفية.


💡 كيف يعمل البلغين؟

📌 حدد النص والخلفية داخل Figma، ثم اضغط على “تحليل التباين”. سيقوم البلغين بحساب نسبة التباين وإظهار تنبيه فوري يخبرك إن كان التباين متوافقًا أو غير متوافق وفقًا لمعايير WCAG.


✅ لماذا هذا مهم؟

✔️ يضمن وضوح النصوص وتحسين تجربة القراءة.

✔️ يساعد المصممين في تحقيق معايير إمكانية الوصول (Accessibility).

✔️ يختصر الوقت في اختبار الألوان داخل التصميم.
plugins.tagline: WCAG Contrast Checker|🔎 تحليل التباين وفقًا لـ WCAG

plugins.name: Variable JSON
plugins.description:
"Variable JSON – Seamlessly Export Figma Variables to JSON"


Quickly convert your Figma variables into clean JSON with Variable JSON. Select your Collection, Group, and Mode, generate the JSON, and copy it instantly—perfect for streamlining design-to-development workflows.


How to Use:

  1. Open Variable JSON: In Figma, go to Plugins > Variable JSON.
  2. Select Variables: Choose the Collection, Group, and Mode (e.g., Light, Dark, or Custom).
  3. Generate JSON: Click "GEN JSON" to create the JSON output based on your selection.
  4. Copy JSON: Click copy button and use it in your projects.


Effortless variable exporting starts here! 🚀

accepted.description:

UX/UI Designer at Innovasive with strengths in UI design, user research, and product strategy.

  2. Select Variables: Choose the Collection, Group, and Mode (e.g., Light, Dark, or Custom).
  3. Generate JSON: Click "GEN JSON" to create the JSON output based on your selection.

Effortless variable exporting starts here! 🚀

plugins.name: Frame to JSON - AI-powered Design-to-Code Converter
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design frames into structured JSON data, ensuring seamless developer handoff and design-to-code consistency.


✨ Key Features

•AI-powered frame analysis

•One-click frame-to-JSON conversion

•Complete hierarchy and style preservation

•Customizable export options

•Developer-friendly structured output


🚀 How to Use

1.Select your target frame(s) in Figma

2.Launch the Frame to JSON plugin

3.Review the extracted structure and properties

4.Click “Generate JSON”

5.Copy or download the JSON output instantly


🛠️ What You’ll Need

•Figma design frames


🔒 Security Note

Your data is processed securely, with no external storage. The plugin ensures precise design-to-code conversion while maintaining full control over your export preferences. No more manual adjustments—let AI handle the complexity! ✨
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma frames into clean JSON with one click your design-to-development bridge made simple!

plugins.name: Dev Resources Manager
plugins.description:
⚠️ Requires Full or Dev Mode seat to add Dev Resources


A powerful tool for designers and developers to connect Figma components with codebase resources, making design handoff seamless.


Dev Resource Management

  1. Add, edit, and delete development resources for components
  2. Link multiple resources to individual components and variants
  3. Manage resources with custom names and URLs

Metadata Management

  1. Export component metadata with development resources
  2. Import metadata to restore or transfer component links
  3. Support for both individual components and component sets
plugins.tagline: Connect your design components to code resources

plugins.name: Wallet Writer
plugins.description: Automate the generation of verified Ethereum and Solana wallet addresses, allowing you to accurately populate multiple text layers and components in one swift action. Designed to streamline your design workflow, ChainFiller eradicates the tediousness of manual copy and paste, minimising errors and ensuring efficiency. plugins.name: Find Word Duplicates Ninja
plugins.description:
Find Word Duplicate Ninja is your reliable assistant for quickly spotting and managing duplicate words within your designs.


Key Features:


Duplicate Word Detection:

Instantly find duplicate words across all text layers.


Automatic Highlighting:

Automatically highlights all occurrences of duplicate words for easy identification.


Customizable Settings:

Adjust minimum word length to match your specific project needs.


Seamless Navigation:

Click a duplicate word tag to navigate directly to all its occurrences within your design.


Intuitive User Interface:

Stylish, user-friendly interface with well-designed tags for optimal usability.


Performance Optimized:

Efficiently handles large files without slowing down Figma's performance.


Why Choose Find Word Duplicate Ninja?


Boost Productivity:

Quickly catch duplicate words, save time, and streamline your workflow.


Improve Consistency:

Ensure consistent text throughout your project without any overlooked duplications.


Easy to Use:

Intuitive and straightforward interface suitable for designers of all levels.

accepted.name: BrandNinjas
accepted.description: UI/UX designer crafting Figma plugins for creatives and efficiency seekers.

plugins.tagline: Quickly identify and highlight duplicate words in your designs.

plugins.name: TXT to Artboard
plugins.description:
TXT to Artboard allows you to quickly generate multiple artboards by entering their name, width, and height in a simple text format.


This plugin is perfect for setting up design systems, responsive layouts, or multi-screen projects with different screen sizes.


Just input the details, and the plugin will automatically create and arrange the artboards on your canvas. Save time and stay organized with this essential design tool.


Examples

og-contact,1200,630

ig/story-recruiting,1080,1920

ig/post-recruiting,1080,1080
plugins.tagline: Create multiple artboards from text input in seconds.

plugins.name: .dot
plugins.description:
.dot is a design command line tool that integrates with Figma, transforming the quick actions menu into a powerful command line interface. With .dot, designers can seamlessly access Tailwind functions, apply colors, and perform a wide range of tasks with speed and efficiency—bringing coding-like control to Figma's design environment.


Example Usage:

  1. It's easy, With a frame select type Cmd + P and .
  2. Choose the .dot plugin
  3. Type 'flex p-8 rounded-md bg-zinc-500' to create a styled container

accepted.name: Matthew Ortega
accepted.description:
A studio exploring technology to invent new forms of art & design

Figma training & design systems @ Fabric Co.

plugins.tagline: Supercharge Figma with Tailwind and custom commands at your fingertips.

plugins.name: PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)
plugins.description:
🖨️ How to Use PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)

PrinTriX is a tool designed for professionals who need accurate CMYK color control for print-ready designs. Here's how to get started:


  1. Go to the Color Palette tab


  1. Add your design colors (in RGB).


  1. Assign CMYK values to each RGB color for precise color mapping.


  1. Enable Color Palette Export: When exporting your design, make sure the Color Palette feature is enabled.


  1. PrinTriX will convert the colors of your design using your custom RGB→CMYK mappings.


With these steps, PrinTriX ensures consistent and high-quality CMYK output for your print files.


Whether you're working on marketing materials, packaging, or brand assets, PrinTriX allows designers to confidently transition from digital design to high-quality print. By supporting advanced features like color profile control, frame selection, and DPI adjustments, the plugin gives teams the precision and flexibility needed to meet even the most demanding print standards. With PrinTriX, maintaining visual consistency across all printed media becomes simple, reliable, and efficient—right from within Figma.

  1. Fine-tune colors with color palette feature that maps RGB colors to your desired CMYK color
  2. Select and organize only the frames you need
  3. Control DPI to balance print quality with file size.
  4. Export Designs to CMYK/Grayscale/RGB print-ready PDFs.
plugins.tagline: CMYK, Print, ColorProfile, PDF, Export, DPI, Bleed

plugins.name: AI Image Generator: Saifs AI
plugins.description:
AI Image Generator brings powerful text-to-image capabilities right into Figma. With just a prompt, you can:


Produce photorealistic or stylistic images in seconds


Adjust aspect ratio, style presets, and color palettes


Batch-generate up to 10 assets at once


Keep everything private—processing happens securely within your files


No external tools required: design, iterate, and refine without ever leaving Figma.

plugins.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
plugins.description:
Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:

  1. Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensions
  2. Creates a beautiful and consistent background from the original cover


Step by step instructions:

  1. Upload a book cover image
  2. Plugin creates a frame containing the formatted image
  3. Export the frame
  4. Upload to Notion as "Files & Media"
plugins.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

131187.name: Notion Book Cover Formatter
131187.description:
Notion Book Cover Formatter solves the common problem of adapting vertical book covers (typically in 2:3 ratio) to Notion's responsive format. Instead of struggling with manual resizing and background creation, this plugin automatically:

  1. Positions your book cover perfectly within the Notion image dimensions
  2. Creates a beautiful and consistent background from the original cover


Step by step instructions:

  1. Upload a book cover image
  2. Plugin creates a frame containing the formatted image
  3. Export the frame
  4. Upload to Notion as "Files & Media"

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to process image data from local file uploads using the fetch API to create formatted book covers.

131187.tagline: Notion-ready book covers with a single image upload

plugins.name: Magic Style Guide
plugins.description:
✨ Magic Style Guide ✨

Create beautiful, clear, professional style guides — in just one click.


Magic Style Guide reads all your color variables (across multiple collections, including linked variables) and text styles to instantly generate an elegant, organized, and ready-to-share style guide.

Perfect for onboarding, documentation, and developer handoff — without any manual work.


---


🔮 Features:


- One-click magic: Instantly document all text styles and color variables.

- Smart descriptions: Auto-generate usage notes based on your style names.

- Linked variables support: Handles both direct and linked variables across collections.

- Multi-collection ready: Organizes styles beautifully even when they span several collections.

- Beautiful output: Clean, professional, and fully structured style guides.


---


Why you'll love it:

Save hours of boring documentation.

Keep your design systems clear, consistent, and ready for scale.

Focus on design — Magic Style Guide takes care of the rest. 🎩✨
plugins.tagline: Generate stunning style guides from Figma styles and variables — instantly!

Keep your design systems clear, consistent, and ready for scale.

130996.release_notes:
🖋️ Text Style Layout Glow-Up
I gave the text styles section a makeover. It’s now sharper, more elegant, and way easier to scan. Like a well-dressed typeface at a job interview.

🧠 Smart Descriptions for Humans
Now automatically adds short, helpful descriptions based on text sizes and color names. No more guessing what “Primary / Surface / Subtle” actually means.

🪄 New Plugin UI (because vibes matter)
The plugin window got a redesign — cleaner layout, a proper call-to-action, and even a lovely image… just for the aesthetic. Nothing essential, but everything nice.
130996.tagline: Generate stunning style guides from Figma styles and variables — instantly!

plugins.name: Frame Sequencer
plugins.description:
Create After Delay prototype links between multiple frames.

  2. Choose a delay time between frames
  3. Click "Sequence Frames" to create the prototype links


Frames are sequenced based on their position - from left to right, top to bottom.


v1 – It looks really ugly now. I created the whole thing in cursor in 30 mins. Gonna add some juice to it soon.

plugins.name: Figma to Cape Template Designer
plugins.description:
Seamlessly Copy Figma Designs to Template Designer


🚀 Copy layers and frames from Figma directly into Template Designer.

🎨 Save time by avoiding manual recreation—copy, paste, and edit instantly.

⚡ Keep your workflow fast and efficient, focusing on design instead of tedious adjustments.

🔄 Easily update and edit imported layers, plus create unlimited formats.


Perfect for designers who want to work smarter. ✨


How to Use the Plugin

1 Select a frame or layer in Figma and click “Copy” in the plugin.

2 Open Template Designer and paste with ⌘V (or Ctrl + V on Windows).

3 Edit, update, and create multiple formats effortlessly!


Features

✅ Save Time & Work Efficiently

Skip the hassle of recreating designs—copy from Figma and start building immediately.

✅ Editable Layers

Make changes to text, images, and more within Template Designer.

✅ Unlimited Formats

Create multiple formats from a single design.

⚠️ Keep in Mind

Some advanced Figma styling elements may not be fully supported.


What is Template Designer?

Template Designer is part of Campaign Designer from Cape, a powerful tool for creating templates that generate multiple creatives. Designers can set up dynamic layers, allowing campaign managers to edit text, images and many more elements easily—making creative production faster and more scalable.


FAQ

What can I do with the plugin?

Quickly transfer your Figma designs into Template Designer without losing time on manual recreation.


Can I edit designs after pasting them?

Yes! You can edit imported layers, adjust elements, and create different formats.


Which elements are supported?

Most Figma layers, including text, shapes, and images. Some advanced styling may not be fully compatible.


What if I encounter an issue?

Let us know at Cape Support—we’re happy to help! ⚡️


This plugin helps designers work faster, update designs easily, and create scalable templates. Try it now and boost your workflow! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma Designs into Template Designer templates

plugins.name: Text Changer
plugins.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.

The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.

plugins.name: Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Make your designs accessible to everyone with this comprehensive accessibility checker. This plugin combines automated testing with guided manual review to ensure your designs meet accessibility standards.


🔍 AUTOMATED CHECKS

- Text contrast analysis against backgrounds

- Font size verification for readability

- Overlapping elements detection

- Missing alt text detection


✅ INTERACTIVE CHECKLIST

Track your progress with a persistent checklist covering key accessibility criteria:

- Contrast and readability

- Color usage and clarity

- Image descriptions and alt text

- Language simplicity

- Animation limits

- Overall design clarity


💡 EDUCATIONAL RESOURCES

Each accessibility issue includes a direct link to relevant WCAG guidelines and best practices to help you learn while you design.


Perfect for designers who want to create more inclusive products and ensure compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1). This plugin makes accessibility checking a seamless part of your design workflow rather than an afterthought.


Whether you're new to accessibility or an experienced designer, this tool helps you identify and fix issues early in the design process, saving development time and creating better experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Create accessible designs with automated checks and guided review

plugins.name: Screenshot Align Resizer
plugins.description: Screenshot Align Resizer resizes screenshots to a specified scale and evenly aligns them in ascending order by object name.
plugins.tagline: Resize and align screenshots.

121699.name: Screenshot Align Resizer
121699.description: Screenshot Align Resizer resizes screenshots to a specified scale and evenly aligns them in ascending order by object name.

plugins.name: Copy Paste Overrides
plugins.description: A tiny tool that does exactly as described. Useful when working with nested instances. Let's say you have a component that contains a list of items. You are working in an instance of that component and want to switch item 1 with item 2 on the list. You cannot do that because reordering of items is not supported within an instance. But what you can do is just copy and paste the overrides from item 1 to item 2 and vice versa. You're welcome!

accepted.name: Fabian Schneider
accepted.description:
UX/UI Designer from 🇦🇹 formerly in 🇩🇪
Other guilty pleasures include Motion Graphics + 3D, Branding and Illustration.

plugins.tagline: Copy the overrides of an instance and paste them onto another instance to replicate it

119945.name: Copy Paste Overrides
119945.description: A tiny tool that does exactly as described. Useful when working with nested instances. Let's say you have a component that contains a list of items. You are working in an instance of that component and want to switch item 1 with item 2 on the list. You cannot do that because reordering of items is not supported within an instance. But what you can do is just copy and paste the overrides from item 1 to item 2 and vice versa. You're welcome!
119945.release_notes:
You can copy and paste overrides for component properties from one instance onto another.

Known limitations:
- nested instances don't fully work
- only overrides for specified properties are copied (for example a text that is changed without it being a property won't be copied)
119945.tagline: Copy the overrides of an instance and paste them onto another instance to replicate it

plugins.name: Conjure - AI based text generator
plugins.description:
Introduction


Use your OpenAI API key with this plugin to quickly generate text for your designs. The plugin can allows to generate multiple text layers based on the content. Furthermore, it can also group the layers by their names, allowing you to use the layer names in the prompt to further elaborate how you want the data to be filled in.


How to use


The plugin was primarily created for 2 use cases:


1. Generate variations of a single type of data:

  1. Select all the text layers that show the same type of data and you want to generate variations of it. Imagine Name, City, Stock price, etc.
  2. Make sure 'Group by layer name' is OFF.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!



2. Generate variations of multiple types of data:

  1. Select all the frames or components that you want to fill using this plugin.
  2. Turn ON 'Group by layer name'. The plugin will show you the layer names found.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. You can use the layer names to add specific context. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!


3. Generated related data

You can use the group by layer name to select singular text layers which are related. An example is when you need text for First name, Last name, DoB, role, location and relatives. The plugin will try to generate related content for these layers.


Note


1. This plugin needs an OpenAI API Key to work.

2. I will recommend naming your text layers appropriately if you plan to use the Group by layer name feature. You can use it without naming the layers, but sometimes this might result in unexpected results.
plugins.tagline: OpenAI powered text generator with batch text generation feature

118471.name: Conjure - AI based text generator
118471.description:
Introduction


Use your OpenAI API key with this plugin to quickly generate text for your designs. The plugin can allows to generate multiple text layers based on the content. Furthermore, it can also group the layers by their names, allowing you to use the layer names in the prompt to further elaborate how you want the data to be filled in.


How to use


The plugin was primarily created for 2 use cases:


1. Generate variations of a single type of data:

  1. Select all the text layers that show the same type of data and you want to generate variations of it. Imagine Name, City, Stock price, etc.
  2. Make sure 'Group by layer name' is OFF.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!



2. Generate variations of multiple types of data:

  1. Select all the frames or components that you want to fill using this plugin.
  2. Turn ON 'Group by layer name'. The plugin will show you the layer names found.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. You can use the layer names to add specific context. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!


3. Generated related data

You can use the group by layer name to select singular text layers which are related. An example is when you need text for First name, Last name, DoB, role, location and relatives. The plugin will try to generate related content for these layers.


Note


1. This plugin needs an OpenAI API Key to work.

2. I will recommend naming your text layers appropriately if you plan to use the Group by layer name feature. You can use it without naming the layers, but sometimes this might result in unexpected results.
118471.tagline: OpenAI powered text generator with batch text generation feature

plugins.name: Banner Framer
plugins.description:
EN description below


バナーサイズの整理をもっと簡単に!!


バナー作成する際、Figmaでのフレームサイズを管理する面倒なストレスを解消します！！Banner Framerを使えば、サイズを忘れたり、フレームの名前を何度も変更する必要がなくなります〜！


Banner Framerの特徴：

•幅と高さを入力するだけでフレームを簡単に生成。

•サイズ情報が含まれた名前を自動で付けて整理をサポート。

•作業効率を上げ、手作業によるミスを軽減。


近日公開：

•サイズプリセットの保存: チームでよく使うバナーサイズを保存して簡単に再利用。

•ワンクリック生成: 保存したサイズをチェックボックスで選択し、瞬時にフレームを生成！

---------------------

Making banner size organization much easier.


Designing banners often requires juggling multiple frame sizes—a task that’s not only repetitive but prone to errors. With Banner Framer, you’ll never forget a size or have to rename frames over and over again.


What Banner Framer does:

•Generate frames effortlessly by entering width and height.

•Automatically name frames with their dimensions for better organization.

•Streamline your workflow and reduce manual errors.


Coming soon:

•Reusable size presets: Save your team’s go-to banner sizes for easy access.

•One-click creation: Select saved sizes with a checkbox and generate frames instantly!
plugins.tagline: Batch-create and customize frames with ease!

116143.description:

plugins.name: JumpMark (Jump Between Marked Figma Components Instantly)
plugins.description:
JumpMark transforms the way you navigate through complex Figma files. This powerful plugin lets you create smart bookmarks for your most-used components, layers, and sections, enabling instant navigation with smooth animations.


🎥 Watch Tutorial | 📱 Follow Us


Key Features:

  1. Smart Bookmark Groups: Organize your bookmarks into custom groups for different project sections, components, or workflows
  2. One-Click Navigation: Jump between bookmarked locations instantly with beautiful smooth animations
  3. Visual Labeling: Color-code your bookmarks and groups for quick visual recognition
  4. Notes & Documentation: Add helpful notes to bookmarks for team collaboration
  5. Drag & Drop Organization: Easily reorder bookmarks within groups
  6. Search Functionality: Quickly find any bookmark or group using the search feature
  7. Custom Animation Settings: Adjust transition speed and style for comfortable navigation


Perfect For:

  1. UX/UI designers working with large design systems
  2. Design teams collaborating on complex projects
  3. Product designers managing multiple component states
  4. Anyone working with extensive Figma files


How It Works:

  1. Select any elements you want to bookmark
  2. Create a group to organize related bookmarks
  3. Add bookmarks with optional notes and color labels
  4. Navigate instantly between locations with a single click


Free Trial Available:

Try all premium features free for 3 hours. Experience smoother Figma navigation and boost your workflow efficiency.

Transform your Figma navigation experience with JumpMark - the smart bookmarking solution for professional designers.


🎯 Stay Updated

  1. Get early access to new features
  2. Join our newsletter for design tips & updates
  3. Be part of our growing design community


✨ Need Help?

Email support
plugins.tagline: JumpMark - Instant Navigation Between Bookmarked Components in Figma

116083.name: JumpMark (Jump Between Marked Figma Components Instantly)
116083.description:
JumpMark transforms the way you navigate through complex Figma files. This powerful plugin lets you create smart bookmarks for your most-used components, layers, and sections, enabling instant navigation with smooth animations.


🎥 Watch Tutorial | 📱 Follow Us


Key Features:

  1. Smart Bookmark Groups: Organize your bookmarks into custom groups for different project sections, components, or workflows
  2. One-Click Navigation: Jump between bookmarked locations instantly with beautiful smooth animations
  3. Visual Labeling: Color-code your bookmarks and groups for quick visual recognition
  4. Notes & Documentation: Add helpful notes to bookmarks for team collaboration
  5. Drag & Drop Organization: Easily reorder bookmarks within groups
  6. Search Functionality: Quickly find any bookmark or group using the search feature
  7. Custom Animation Settings: Adjust transition speed and style for comfortable navigation


Perfect For:

  1. UX/UI designers working with large design systems
  2. Design teams collaborating on complex projects
  3. Product designers managing multiple component states
  4. Anyone working with extensive Figma files


How It Works:

  1. Select any elements you want to bookmark
  2. Create a group to organize related bookmarks
  3. Add bookmarks with optional notes and color labels
  4. Navigate instantly between locations with a single click


Free Trial Available:

Try all premium features free for 3 hours. Experience smoother Figma navigation and boost your workflow efficiency.

Transform your Figma navigation experience with JumpMark - the smart bookmarking solution for professional designers.


🎯 Stay Updated

  1. Get early access to new features
  2. Join our newsletter for design tips & updates
  3. Be part of our growing design community


✨ Need Help?

Email support

plugins.name: Mailman for Klaviyo

Streamline your email design workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Klaviyo. Perfect for agencies and brands managing multiple Klaviyo accounts. Key features:


  1. Direct export from Figma to Klaviyo with preserved design fidelity
  2. Support for multiple Klaviyo account management
  3. Save and reuse HTML templates and blocks

plugins.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
plugins.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.
plugins.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

89740.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
89740.description:

  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.

89740.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

plugins.name: Relayout Map Generator
plugins.description: Relayout Map Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that allows you to search, customize, and generate high-quality maps directly within your design workflow. Easily adjust zoom levels, dimensions, and add location markers. With support for OpenStreetMap and place suggestions, it's the perfect tool for creating location-based visuals, UI mockups, travel interfaces, and more—without ever leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Turn any location into a design-ready map—directly inside Figma.

plugins.name: CSS Variables to Figma
plugins.description:
Import css variables into Figma variables

This plugin enables you import color variables from CSS into Figma, supporting both single-mode and dual Light/Dark mode setups. It maps your CSS variables to Figma's variable modes, converting formats like OKLCH (Tailwind), HEX, RGBA, and RGB into Figma-compatible HEX values. OKLCH, P3, and HCT color values are also preserved and attached to each variable for reference.


Example:


.light {
--color-primary: #000;
}
.dark {
--color-primary: #fff;
}


How it works:

  1. Paste your CSS variables in the text area below.
  2. Click "Export to JSON" to generate a Figma-compatible variables file.
  3. Import the JSON file into Figma using the Figma Variables by Honza Toman


Watch video→ how it works.


Currently supported:

  1. Color variables
  2. Attach oklch, p3 colors and HCT values to variable syntax


Next updates:

  1. Border radius variables
  2. Spacing variables
  3. Shadows
  4. ...


Feedback and support

  1. Let us know your feedback and suggestions! @sans_sherif
  2. Support the development of this plugin buy us a coffee ☕
plugins.tagline: Import existing css variables to figma variables
